content: अनुव्रत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुकूलं व्रतं कर्म यस्य] {@--1@} Devoted or faithful to, attached to (with <ab>acc.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab>); प्रियतमा का अनुव्रता <ls>Bh. 2. 103</ls>; वैश्याः क्षत्रमनुव्रताः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Duly performing the vows or duties prescribed (<ab>opp.</ab> अपव्रत). --तः A class of Jaina ascetics.
